title: The Equation of Equality for Women in Tech
itunes:title: The Equation of Equality for Women in Tech
description:
Bertina Ceccarelli, CEO of NPower, discusses plans to bring more women of color into the technology field.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
